connectfour

Class ConnectFour

  • java.lang.Object
    • connectfour.ConnectFour
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiPlayerConnectFour, SinglePlayerConnectFour

    public abstract class ConnectFour
extends java.lang.Object
    A ConnectFour is a top Level class for a variation of ConnectFour is observable and contains a GameInformer for to inform its Observers on what is happening
    Version:
    1.0 August 7, 2016
    Author:
    Arturo Muller
